item.title: containerized centos 7 issues and solutions
compiling LPMX's dependencies on centos 5.5
item.description: LPMX is a pure composable rootless container system. It runs purely in rootless mode and is designed for running under restricted environments such as grid infrastructure and batch system, where end-users could not get root privileges. LPMX itself is developed using golang and could be easily compiled and deployed acroos different platforms. However, its dependencis including fakechroot, fakeroot and memcached related stuff have to be recompiled. Here I use centos 5.
